titles.title: I want to praise you, Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I want to praise You Lord
Much more than I do
I want to praise You lord
Much more than I do
Learn to seek Your face
And the knowledge of Your grace
I want to praise You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Birds in the sky sing their songs to You
Trees in the fields lift their arms to You
I want to sing I want to lift my arms to You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I want to love You Lord
Much more than I do
I want to love You lord
Much more than I do
Learn to seek Your face
And the knowledge of Your grace
I want to love You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Birds in the sky sing their songs to You
Trees in the fields lift their arms to You
I want to sing I want to lift my arms to You

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I want to serve You lord....
